indexterm.see: ISO Entity Sets, Added Math Symbols: Binary Operators

refmeta.refentrytitle: Added Math Symbols: Binary Operators Character Entities (%isoamsb;)

refnamediv.refpurpose: Added Math Symbols: Binary Operators Character Entities

refsynopsisdiv.para:
The %isoamsb; parameter entity includes the ISO character entities with the public identifier:
ISO 8879:1986//ENTITIES Added Math Symbols: Binary Operators//EN
